source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Dustman Bo Bu would come to the aid of his order's resident genius.
target: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_00<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のダストマン789 ボ・ブは、仲間が気になっているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_01<tab>Bo Bu, convinced that he is Ba Go's favorite apprentice despite the latter's unwillingness to speak so much as a word to him, would come to his self-proclaimed master's aid─or have you do so in his stead. Speak with the acolyte and see what manner of task he would see done.
target: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_01<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブから、アコライト789 バ・ゴに手を貸すよう頼まれた。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」から事情を聞こう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_02<tab>789th Order Acolyte Ba Go seeks a pair of rare ingredients for prototype bombs he would fashion─namely, a golem soulstone and a hard doblyn shell. No ordinary stone or shell will do, however. Dispatch two ordinary U'Ghamaro golems and two synthetic doblyns to lure their masters out of hiding, then slay these formidable foes to acquire the materials that Ba Go seeks.
target: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_02<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴから、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894101 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894201 /var>の入手を頼まれた。ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山で「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209DA01 /var>」を2体討伐し、おびき寄せた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A9A01 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894101 /var>」を入手しよう。同様に「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2072C01 /var>」を2体討伐し、おびき寄せた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A9901 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894201 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_03<tab>Your opponents having fallen, you have the rare soulstone and doblyn shell sought by Ba Go in hand. Deliver them to Bo Bu, whose ability to identify the materials will be the test that determines whether he can truly serve as Ba Go's trusted assistant, or simply as the target of the acolyte's next detonation test.
target: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894101 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894201 /var>を入手した。第789洞穴団の採掘地の「ダストマン789 ボ・ブ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894101 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E894201 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_04<tab>Bo Bu gleefully takes the bombcrafting materials in hand despite giving no indication that he has the slightest idea regarding their nature. The young dustman's ambition is admirable, however, and one can only hope that his master will be gentle...
target: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_SEQ_04<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブに、アコライト789 バ・ゴに頼まれた物を渡した。真相はともかく、彼は意外と面倒見がいいのかもしれない。ダストマン789 ボ・ブが本当に仲間の力になれるよう、見本として頑張っていこう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_00<tab>Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_00<tab>アコライト789 バ・ゴと話す

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_01<tab>Defeat two U'Ghamaro golems, then slay Number 132 when it appears to acquire its soulstone.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_01を2体討伐し、
おびき寄せたからを入手

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_02<tab>Defeat two synthetic doblyns, then slay the greater doblyn that appears and acquire its shell.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_02を2体討伐し、
おびき寄せたからを入手

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the materials to 789th Order Dustman Bo Bu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_TODO_03<tab>ダストマン789 ボ・ブに爆弾の材料を渡す

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_000<tab>I know it, I sense it, I feel it in my bones. Master Ba Go has a task for his trusted apprentice Bo Bu!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_000「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」の様子が　変なのであーる。
まるでワガハイに　何かを隠しているようなのであーる……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_001<tab>A trying task he has, and yet he fears for Bo Bu's safety─worries, frets, fears. Yet he worries for nothing. Yes, yes, for naught!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_001まったーく　シャイなヤツなのであーる。
心の広いこのワガハイ　いくらでも相談に乗るというのーに。
同じ洞穴団の仲間を　見捨てたりはしないのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_002<tab>For Bo Bu is ever loyal and brave─courageous, valiant, brave! Bo Bu shrinks not from his duty─no, never─but sends you straight to Ba Go in his stead. Yes, friend, go forth! Go forth and do Bo Bu proud!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_002そういうわけでオヌーシ　ワガハイの代わりーに
「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」の話を　聞いてやるのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_003<tab>Bo Bu shrinks not from his duty─no, never─but sends you straight to Ba Go in his stead. Yes, friend, go forth! Go forth and do Bo Bu proud!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_003そういうわけでオヌーシ　ワガハイの代わりーに
「アコライト789 バ・ゴ」の話を　聞いてやるのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_010<tab>You return to Ba Go, yesss? Excellent. Ba Go feared that Bo Bu would come stumbling in─bungling, bumbling, stumbling. All talk and no action, that one.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_010ボクちゃんの様子を　見にきてくれたのかーい？
……ククク……ボ・ブじゃ　役に立たないからーね。
相談するだけ　無駄なことだったのーよ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_011<tab>But you have served Ba Go well before, and you will serve Ba Go again. Yeeesss, yesss, you will.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_011実はチミに　取ってきてほしいものがあるーの。
「」と「」……
もちろーん　爆弾に使う材料だーよ……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_012<tab>Ba Go would build his most lethal beauties yet, yet Ba Go lacks for the materials he needs. A soulstone and a doblyn shell, though not any will do, no, no!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_012ククク……「ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山」の中にーは
「」と
「」が　たくさんいるーね。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_013<tab>The stone and shell Ba Go seeks must be taken straight from the guardians of depths most dark─shadowy, murky, dark. Slay golem and doblyn underlings, and their masters will come─yes, oh yes, will they come! Heahehaheahaha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_013そいつら倒すーと　目的のものを持っていーる
「」と「」が
姿を見せるはーず……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_100_013<tab>When you have what I seek, deliver it to Bo Bu. If he can tell me what it is, he may serve me, yes. If he cannot, I shall set his whiskers alight─aflame, ablaze, alight.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_100_013ククク……取れた材料は　ボ・ブに渡しといてーよ。
アイツは　プライドだーけは高いからーね……。
たまにーは　花を持たせてやるーよ……クククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_014<tab>Ba Go would build his most lethal beauties yet, yet Ba Go lacks for the materials he needs. A soulstone and a doblyn shell, though not any will do, no, no!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_014ククク……「ウ・ガマロ武装鉱山」の中にーは
「」と
「」が　たくさんいるーね。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_015<tab>The stone and shell Ba Go seeks must be taken straight from the guardians of depths most dark─shadowy, murky, dark. Slay golem and doblyn underlings, and their masters will come─yes, oh yes, will they come! Heahehaheahaha!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BAGO_000_015そいつら倒すーと　目的のものを持っていーる
「」と「」が
姿を見せるはーず……よろしく頼んだーよ……ククク。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_030<tab>You have come to the aid of Master Ba Go, yes, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_030どうであーる？
バ・ゴの悩みーは　解決したのであるーか？

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_031<tab>Incredible─astounding, amazing, incredible! Why, these are the most spectacular...whatsits...that Bo Bu has ever seen!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_031コ　コレは……？　む　無論知っていーる！
ワガハイ　よーくご存知であーる！
コレはとっても貴重な…………………………。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_032<tab>I shall bring them to Master Ba Go at once, and he shall rejoice! Yes, yes, he will be beside himself with joy at seeing his prize pupil deliver these remarkable...things!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_032……と　とにかーく　コレはワガハイが　責任もって
バ・ゴに届けておくのであーる！　ご苦労だったのであーる！
オヌーシを派遣したワガハイ　実に賢いのであーる！

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_033<tab>Yes, no doubt he will be quick to share with me the fruits of his latest research─the results, the products, the fruits! I am in for a hair-raising experience, yes, yes, I am!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_BOBU_000_033まったーく　バ・ゴも世話が焼けるやつであーる。
フフン……ワガハイがちょっと絡めばこんなものであーる。
もっと素直にワガハイ　頼ればいいものーを。

source: TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>Ancient slabs of stone spring to life around you!
TEXT_BANKOB308_01371_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>With a chitter and a whir, the creature is upon you!
